select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into comm_board(bno, title, content, writer) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update comm_board set title =#{title}, content =#{content}, writer =#{writer}, updatedate=sysdate where bno =#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(comm_board pk_comm_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from comm_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
